text: @FLOTUS @WhiteHouse @POTUS Trump bankrupted a bunch of casinos and now is destroying our country with more than 40 million Americans losing their jobs and a second wave of coronavirus cases sweeping our nation. President Obama started our country on an economic recovery while Trump just brought us misery.
